item.title: Nash Holos Ukrainian Roots Radio, May 27, 2012
item.itunes:author: Pawlina
item.dc:creator: Pawlina
item.description: Sylvia Molnar’s recipe for chicken in dill cream sauce with 2 variations. Ukraine News Outlook with Keith Perron: Feminism in Ukraine & the controversial feminist group FEMEN. Ukrainian proverb, music & more!
item.content:encoded: Sylvia Molnar’s recipe for chicken in dill cream sauce with 2 variations. Ukraine News Outlook with Keith Perron: Feminism in Ukraine & the controversial feminist group FEMEN. Ukrainian proverb, music & more!

item.title: Nash Holos Ukrainian Roots Radio, May20, 2012
item.itunes:author: Pawlina
item.dc:creator: Pawlina
item.description: Sylvia’s recipe: stuffed beef patties. News with Keith: European leaders inspired to help Ukraine, oil drilling in Ukraine’s future. Canadian politicians share experiences of Ukraine visit with Ukrainian Canadian media. Ukrainian proverb, music & more!

item.title: Nash Holos Ukrainian Roots Radio – May 13, 2012
item.itunes:author: Pawlina
item.dc:creator: Pawlina
item.description: Sylvia Molnar’s recipe: Prawns Kyiv. News with Keith Perron: More pressure on Ukraine from the European Union, new Russian film opens old wounds. Did You Know with Irena Bell: Trembita - Ukraine's alpen horn. Ukrainian proverb, music & more!
item.content:encoded: Sylvia Molnar’s recipe: Prawns Kyiv. News with Keith Perron: More pressure on Ukraine from the European Union, new Russian film opens old wounds. Did You Know with Irena Bell: Trembita - Ukraine's alpen horn. Ukrainian proverb, music & more!

item.description: Sylvia Molnar’s recipe: potato filling for cabbage rolls. News with Keith Perron: More on the nasty politics in Ukraine. Did You Know with Irena Bell: Trembita - Ukraine's alpen horn. Ukrainian proverb, music & more!
